EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

CapitalUnitsAuthorized.label: Capital Units, Authorized
CapitalUnitsAuthorized.description: Number of authorized capital units or capital shares. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

CapitalUnitsOutstanding.label: Capital Units, Outstanding
CapitalUnitsOutstanding.description: Number of capital units or capital shares outstanding. This element is relevant to issuers of face-amount certificates and registered investment companies.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerDistribu.label: Distribution Made to Limited Partner, Distributions Declared, Per Unit
DistributionMadeToLimitedPartnerDistribu.description: Per unit of ownership amount of cash distributions declared to unit-holder of a limited partnership (LP).

DueFromRelatedParties.label: Due from Related Parties
DueFromRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from related parties including affiliates, employees, joint ventures, officers and stockholders, immediate families thereof, and pension funds.

FairValueAssetsLevel1ToLevel2TransfersAm.label: Fair Value, Assets, Level 1 to Level 2 Transfers, Amount
FairValueAssetsLevel1ToLevel2TransfersAm.description: Amount of transfers of assets measured on a recurring basis out of Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 2.

FairValueAssetsLevel2ToLevel1TransfersAm.label: Fair Value, Assets, Level 2 to Level 1 Transfers, Amount
FairValueAssetsLevel2ToLevel1TransfersAm.description: Amount of transfers of assets measured on a recurring basis out of Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 1.

FairValueLiabilitiesLevel1ToLevel2Transf.label: Fair Value, Liabilities, Level 1 to Level 2 Transfers, Amount
FairValueLiabilitiesLevel1ToLevel2Transf.description: Amount of transfers of liabilities measured on a recurring basis out of Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 2.

FairValueLiabilitiesLevel2ToLevel1Transf.label: Fair Value, Liabilities, Level 2 to Level 1 Transfers, Amount
FairValueLiabilitiesLevel2ToLevel1Transf.description: Amount of transfers of liabilities measured on a recurring basis out of Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 1.

FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.label: Floor Brokerage, Exchange and Clearance Fees
FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.description: The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.

GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsHeldForTr.label: Gain (Loss) on Derivative Instruments Held for Trading Purposes, Net
GainLossOnDerivativeInstrumentsHeldForTr.description: Aggregate net gain and losses (whether realized or unrealized) on all derivative instruments held for trading purposes whether or not settled physically.

GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: General and Administrative Expense
GeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: The aggregate total of expenses of managing and administering the affairs of an entity, including affiliates of the reporting entity, which are not directly or indirectly associated with the manufacture, sale or creation of a product or product line.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: General Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of general partner units outstanding.

IncomeLossAttributableToParent.label: Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent, before Tax
IncomeLossAttributableToParent.description: Amount, before tax, of income (loss) attributable to parent. Includes, but is not limited to, income (loss) from continuing operations, discontinued operations and equity method investments.

IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.label: Interest and Dividend Income, Operating
InterestAndDividendIncomeOperating.description: Represents the total of interest and dividend income, including any amortization and accretion (as applicable) of discounts and premiums, earned from (1) loans and leases whether held-for-sale or held-in-portfolio; (2) investment securities; (3) federal funds sold; (4) securities purchased under agreements to resell; (5) investments in banker's acceptances, commercial paper, or certificates of deposit; (6) dividend income; or (7) other investments not otherwise specified herein.

InterestIncomeExpenseNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of operating interest income (expense).

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

InterestReceivable.label: Interest Receivable
InterestReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of interest earned but not received. Also called accrued interest or accrued interest receivable.

InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.label: Investment Owned, Percent of Net Assets
InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.description: Percent of net assets at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, each category should have a percent of net assets for the aggregated value of the Investments in the category.

InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedApp.label: Investment Owned, Unrecognized Unrealized Appreciation (Depreciation), Net
InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedApp.description: This element represents the net excess or deficiency of the fair value of an investment (security, contract) over or under its cost (face amount, notional amount), respectively, which excess value or deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.label: Limited Liability Company or Limited Partnership, Members or Limited Partners, Ownership Interest
LimitedLiabilityCompanyLLCOrLimitedPartn.description: Percentage investment held by members or limited partners of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of limited partner units outstanding.

LiquidationBasisOfAccountingAccruedCosts.label: Liquidation Basis of Accounting, Accrued Costs to Dispose of Assets and Liabilities
LiquidationBasisOfAccountingAccruedCosts.description: Amount of estimated accrued costs to dispose of assets or other items expected to be sold in liquidation.

LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueProvi.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Carrying Value, Provision (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueProvi.description: The charge against earnings in the period to increase loss contingency liabilities, net of any adjustments to reduce previously estimated charges.

LossContingencyAccrualProvision.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Provision
LossContingencyAccrualProvision.description: Amount charged against operating income increasing loss contingency liability, after adjustments to reduce previously estimated charges.

LossContingencyNewClaimsFiledNumber.label: Loss Contingency, New Claims Filed, Number
LossContingencyNewClaimsFiledNumber.description: The total number of new claims filed pertaining to a loss contingency during the period.

NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.label: Net Income (Loss), Per Outstanding Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit, Basic and Diluted, Net of Tax
NetIncomeLossPerOutstandingLimitedPartne.description: The amount of net income or loss for the period per each limited partnership and general partnership unit in instances when basic and diluted earnings per unit are the same amount and aggregated on the face of the financial statements. Basic earnings per unit is the amount of net income or loss for the period per unit outstanding during the reporting period. Diluted earnings per unit includes the amount of net income or loss for the period available to each limited and general partnership unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of units for all dilutive potential units outstanding during the reporting period.

NoninterestExpenseCommissionExpense.label: Noninterest Expense Commission Expense
NoninterestExpenseCommissionExpense.description: Amount of fees incurred for commissions on mutual funds and insurance products.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OtherAssets.label: Other Assets
OtherAssets.description: Amount of assets classified as other.

OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.label: Other General and Administrative Expense
OtherGeneralAndAdministrativeExpense.description: Amount of general and administrative expense classified as other.

OtherLiabilities.label: Other Liabilities
OtherLiabilities.description: Amount of liabilities classified as other.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsContributed.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Contributed
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsContributed.description: Units contributed by each class of partners during the year. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsPeriodIncreas.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Period Increase (Decrease)
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsPeriodIncreas.description: Total net change in the units of each class of partners' capital accounts during the year. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Redeemed
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsRedeemed.description: The number of units redeemed during the year of each class of partners' capital account. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingOrgani.label: Payables to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
PayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingOrgani.description: Amount payable to broker-dealers and clearing organizations, including, but not limited to, securities failed-to-receive, certain deposits received for securities loaned, open transactions, and floor-brokerage payables.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.label: Realized Investment Gains (Losses)
RealizedInvestmentGainsLosses.description: Amount of realized gain (loss) on investment.

ReimbursementRevenue.label: Reimbursement Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
ReimbursementRevenue.description: Repayment received or receivable for expenses incurred on behalf of a client or customer, other than those reimbursements received by landlords from tenants.

RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents
RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

RevenuesExcludingInterestAndDividends.label: Revenues, Excluding Interest and Dividends
RevenuesExcludingInterestAndDividends.description: Revenues from operations, excluding interest and dividend income. Includes revenues from the following sources: investment banking (underwriting and financial advisory), principal transactions (sales and trading, and investment gains and losses), commissions, asset management, and investment advisory and other services.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.label: Weighted Average Number of Limited Partnership and General Partnership Unit Outstanding, Basic and Diluted
WeightedAverageNumberOfLimitedPartnershi.description: The average number of limited partnership and general partnership units issued and outstanding that are used in calculating basic and diluted earnings per limited partnership and general partnership unit.
